name: apigee-devrel
description: Common solutions and tools developed for Apigee.

scripts.pipeline: npm run build-pipeline-runner && docker run -e APIGEE_USER -e APIGEE_PASS -e APIGEE_ORG -e APIGEE_ENV -v $(pwd):/home -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -it apigee/devrel run-pipelines.sh
scripts.autofix: npm run build-pipeline-runner && docker run -e APIGEE_USER -e APIGEE_PASS -e APIGEE_ORG -e APIGEE_ENV -v $(pwd):/home -it apigee/devrel autofix.sh
